Module it.polimi.ingsw

Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.message.to_client

Contains all the possible messages that a client can receive.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ChooseCards
    Message sent from the server to a client to ask him to choose among some cards.
    ChooseGameName
    Message sent from the server to a client to ask him to choose the name of the Game.
    ChooseGameRoom
    Message sent from the server to a client to ask him to choose the Game room to play in.
    ChooseNickname
    Message sent from the server to a client to ask him to choose his nickname.
    ChoosePlayersNumber
    Message sent from the server to a client to ask him to choose the number of players for the Game.
    ChoosePosition
    Message sent from the server to a client to ask him to choose a position between those available.
    ChooseStartingPlayer
    Message sent from the server to a client to ask him to choose the starting Player.
    ChooseStartJoin
    Message sent from the server to a client to ask him to choose between starting a new Game or joining an existing one.
    ChooseYesNo
    Message sent from the server to a client to ask him to choose a position between those available.
    DisplayBuild
    Message sent from the server to a client to display a new build.
    DisplayGameInfo
    Message sent from the server to a client to display new information about the current Game.
    DisplayMessage
    Message sent from the server to a client to display a message from the server.
    DisplayMove
    Message sent from the server to a client to display a new move.
    DisplayPlaceWorker
    Message sent from the server to a client to display a new Worker being placed.
    NotifyDisconnection
    Message sent from the server to a client to notify him about the disconnection of a Player.
    NotifyGameOver
    Message sent from the server to a client to notify him that the current Game is over.
    NotifyGameStarting
    Message sent from the server to a client to notify him about the disconnection of a Player.
    NotifyLoss
    Message sent from the server to a client to notify him that he lost the current Game.
    NotifyWin
    Message sent from the server to a client to notify him that he won the current Game.
    Ping
    Ping message sent from the server to a client.
    ServerClosed
    Message sent from the server to a client to notify him that the server has closed.
    ToClientMessage
    Abstract class that represents a generic message sent from the server to a client.
